thread.title: Gruppo Montenegro Appoints Robert Cullins as North American Regional Director

author: cnbc.com
title: Gruppo Montenegro Appoints Robert Cullins as North American Regional Director
text:
BOLOGNA, Italy, Feb. 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Gruppo Montenegro, one of the leading Italian spirit and food manufacturers, has named Robert Cullins as the Regional Director of North America. As a part of his role, Cullins will lead the development of the company's regional strategy, including marketing efforts, investments and distributor and importer relations.
Cullins brings more than three decades of international spirits industry experience to Gruppo Montenegro's North American operations – most recently serving as the Global CEO of Stoli Group, where he was responsible for the long-term operational strategy, brand positioning and revenue achievements. Previously, Cullins served in a variety of roles for leading global spirit companies, including Maxxium, Southern Wines and Spirits, E & J Gallo and Diageo, where he managed premium brands such as Macallan, Remy Martin, Johnnie Walker and Tanqueray.
"The U.S. market is one of our key growth drivers and North America is critical for our company," said Marco Ferrari, CEO, Gruppo Montenegro. "Rob's experience and leadership at the helm of our brands in North America will drive the achievements and successes we've set out to accomplish."
The addition of Cullins to the Gruppo Montenegro team continues the company's overall investment in North America, led by its Amaro Montenegro and Aperitivo Select brands. Amaro Montenegro, the company's namesake, is one of the most rapidly growing brands in the amaro category. Since entering the North American marketplace in 2014, Montenegro has experienced growth of more than 127 percent.
"I am thrilled to join Gruppo Montenegro at this critical juncture to develop new strategies and expand our success across North America," Cullins remarked. "I'm eager to join U.S. Market Manager, Marco Montefiori, Montenegro Portfolio Managers, Gianni Aslo and Elliot Montero as well as our distribution partner, Total Beverage Solution as we continue to fuel momentum for the brand's portfolio."
Cullins' position with Gruppo Montenegro is effective immediately and he will initially be based in South Florida.
About Gruppo Montenegro
Founded in 1885, Gruppo Montenegro is a leading Italian food and spirits manufacturer. The company's brands have become icons of the "Made in Italy" with strong brand equity and cultural significance. Gruppo Montenegro's portfolio includes: Amaro Montenegro, Vecchia Romagna, Apertivo Select, Bonomelli infusions, Infrè decaf tea, Olio Cuore, Cannamela spices, Polenta Valsugana, Pizza Catarì. The success of these brands is the result of a constant pursuit of excellence, respect for tradition and attention to product quality and sustainability, all values that have defined Gruppo Montenegro since its inception. As a result of a strong national and international distribution network, the brands are true ambassadors of the Italian way of life.
